msbt.message: Ah, I'm so glad you came to see me off, . It's terribly kind of you. I suppose now that you're here I can tell you in person how much you've meant to me, . I wouldn't be setting off on this new adventure if it weren't for your encouragement. Sothank you!

Oh, did you come to say goodbye? Well, I'm glad you did.When I wasn't sure if this island life was for me, you encouraged me to be brave and consider my options. So now I can set out on this voyage with my head held high! I'll truly miss you, .

Oh, it's you! I'm so glad you decided to come see me before I head out tomorrow. I'm excited, of course, but still a bit reluctant to leave my comfortable life here on the island But you know what they say. You should do one thing that scares you every day. Hopefully this counts for at least a week!

Oh, it's you! , I haven't told you, have IThere's no way to sugarcoat this, so I'll give it to you straight. I'm moving off the island tomorrow. I'm glad to have met you, and I will NOT forget you. Thank you for everything that you've done.

Oh, hello! I don't believe we've met before. Do you live here on this island? Well, I'm a resident as well, though not for much longer I'm actually moving out tomorrow! So, I suppose it's just a quick hello before goodbyeit's a bit sad, but sort of beautiful, don't you think? I'm glad I got to meet you, .

Oh, I thought that was you, ! Good to see you again. Yes, it's true. I'm getting ready to move away.The only thing isI'm not sure exactly where yet. I know, I know planning ahead isn't my strong suit.
Move to my island!
Good luck!

Oh my! ! I thought that was you.Yes, it's true. As you can see, I'm getting ready to move. I'm sorry there's nowhere for you to sit down. But I'm SO very glad I got to say goodbye to you, .It would have been just awful had you come by for a visit only to find me gone without a word.

Oh, I don't believe we've met! Fancy thaton the day before I'm set to move away, I meet someone new. I suppose I'm only OK telling you this because you're a strangerI don't actually know where I'm moving yet! How's that for a first impression?

Oh my, pleased to meet you. I'm . Charmed, I'm sure. Now, while I'm sure you'd love nothing more than to get to know me better, I must be honest with you I'm packing to move today. Yes, it's true. I'm leaving this island behind, ! I'm quite excited about where I'm moving! All the pieces just fell into place, darling. Toodles!
Well, thank you. Perhaps we'll meet again on some other island in this vast and mysterious world
Yes, it's true. I've decided that I'm moving to .I have the most charming space all picked out. You MUST come visit me once I'm settled!
Well, it's not long now before I say goodbye forever I suppose it does make me a bit sad. Chin up, ! There are new adventures to be had!
Well, well, well! Look who's here! It looks like we have the same taste in islands, ! How was after I left, hmm? I assume I was missed.We'll have to sit down and catch up sometime soon, OK?
I suppose the next time we see each other will be on , won't it? I'm a bit nervous to move to a whole new islandbut less so knowing that you'll be there too!
I'll soon be living on an island called . Have you heard of it? Well, if you ever get a chance to visit, I do hope you'll come see me.
Moving is such a tiresome chore. But hopefully, in the end, it will have all been worth it. Still, what I wouldn't give for a lounge chair and a nice glass of right now
I wonder what awaits me on my new island I only hope that I can embrace whatever comes. Of course, I'll never forget my time here, or my friends.
Even though I'm all packed up, it still doesn't feel real that I'm leaving tomorrow. Ah well. It must mean my time here on this island was special and will always have a place in my heart.
Well, I'm just about ready to depart. The only thing left to do is figure out where I'm going. It's so not me to be careless about this, but I just can't help myself—I want to roam free!
What about my island?
Good luck!
Oh, right—. Why didn't I think of that? You know what? I'll do it! It'll be nice to know at least one person while I'm starting out. I'll call Resident Services right away!
Oh, well, you seeI wasn't sure if that was a real invitation or if you were just being polite. Now that I'm sure you mean it, I should call Resident Services! Thank you!

Can't get rid of me soon enough, eh, ? I'm just teasing you. I actually have mixed feelings about leaving this place, you know. Lot of good memories here. But until I find the perfect place for , I mustn't look back.

I have big news, . I called Resident Services, and guess what Go on, guess! Oh, alright. They said, "Welcome to !"Thank you so much for inviting me. I'm over the moon! You must come visit once I'm done moving.

Ah, I appreciate you waiting for me, . You'll never believe what's happened! I called Resident Services and they told me there's no room for new residents! Hmph! It sounds like a zoning issue, so there's nothing to be done. In any case, thank you for the invite.

Ah, I appreciate you waiting for me, . So darling, here's the thing I called Resident Services, and they said there's no room for new houses. Perhaps it's a zoning issue? Who knows! It's not worth arguing about. But I do appreciate the invitation.

I must say, your island must have quite a lot going for it to have filled up completely I was indifferent before, but now I'm rather sad I can't join you there. Ah, well. Thank you again for the invite.

It's hard to believe that there's no more room for houses on your island, . Surely a small house could be built? But thenI suppose I wouldn't be happy with a small house, would I? Ah well, thank you for thinking of me. I'm sure it would have been a beautiful arrangement, .
You know, I just can't seem to put this whole thing out of my mindPerhaps I should try calling Resident Services another time? After all, I have nothing to lose.
Good idea!
Bad idea.
Oh! No, you're right. I shouldn't make a nuisance of myself, . How ill-mannered of me to even consider it.
